measure.CatchLine: Permits Building Codes Structures Board to adopt licensing standards for performing structural masonry in essential facilities.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Permits Building Codes Structures Board to adopt licensing standards for performing structural masonry in essential facilities. Permits Construction Contractors Board to adopt licensing standards for applying or installing fireproofing materials in essential facilities. 
	Requires Department of Consumer and Business Services to adopt rules to require adequate fireproofing in all newly constructed essential facilities. Specifies minimum provisions required in department's rules. 
	Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to building codes applicable to essential facilities; creating new provisions; amending ORS 455.117 and 455.447; and prescribing an effective date.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to building codes applicable to essential facilities; prescribing an effective date.
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
